00102 /**
00103  * @brief Run the analysis.
00104  */
00105 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2RatioCyto2::run()
00106 {
00107 //    Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLog2RatioCyto2::run(...) start");
00108     isSetup();
00109     m_dYTarget = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("yTarget");
00110     Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLog2RatioCyto2::run(...) ", 5, 1, 5);
00111 
00112     determineLocalProbeSets();
00113 
00114     calculateLog2Ratios(true);
00115     trim();
00116 
00117         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00118         {
00119             writeLog2Ratios("original");
00120             writeLog2RatiosTsv("original", getProbeSets());
00121         }
00122 
00123 
00124     applyWaveCorrection();
00125     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00126 
00127     if (m_bGCCorrection)
00128     {
00129         GCCorrection(getExperiment());
00130                 if(m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00131                 {
00132                         writeLog2Ratios("afterGCCorrection");
00133                         writeLog2RatiosTsv("afterGCCorrection", getProbeSets());
00134 
00135                 }
00136     }
00137 
00138     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00139     if (m_bMedianAutosomeMedianNormalization)
00140     {
00141         calculateMedianAutosomeMedian(getExperiment());
00142         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00143         normalizeLog2Ratios(getExperiment());
00144     }
00145     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00146     calculateQCMetrics(getExperiment());
00147     getProbeSets()->calculateLog2RatioMedianSmooth(m_iMedianSmoothWindowSize);
00148     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00149 //    Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLog2RatioCyto2::run(...) end");
00150 }
00151 
00152 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2RatioCyto2::applyWaveCorrection()
00153 {
00154     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) {return;}
00155     if (!m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")) {return;}
00156     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method")) {return;}
00157     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") == "none") {return;}
00158     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") == "") {return;}
00159 
00160     CNAnalysisMethodFactory amFactory;
00161     CNAnalysisMethod* am = NULL;
00162     am = amFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString(m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method"));
00163     am->setEngine(m_pEngine);
00164     am->setup(*getExperiment(), *(CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()));
00165     am->run();
00166     delete am;
00167 }
